metadata.title: CVE-2018-20004 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been found in Mini-XML (aka mxml) 2.12. It is a stack-basedbuffer overflow in mxml_write_node in mxml-file.c via vectors involving adouble-precision floating point number and the '<order type="real">'substring, as demonstrated by testmxml.

criterions.comment: mxml package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
